alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 11:23AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Dale, Coffee and northwestern Geneva Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1123 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Samson to 8 miles southwest of Level Plains. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, New Brockton, Ariton, Lee, Clayhatchee, Kinston, Coffee Springs, Mixons Crossroads, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald, Central City, Camp Humming Hills and Clintonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
